text:
This region is set aside for the
youngest [[dragon]]s of the [[Vast]]. It is essentially a training
ground, where newcomers can test their wits against each
other before claiming a dominion in the Vast proper. It’s
rare to encounter a dragon older than a young adult here;
most monsters are <<showcreature-lteq "tier 3 or lower" 3>>. However, if adventurers or other non[[dragon]]s take advantage of this—slaying too many of the dragons or stealing their rightful prey—it should attract the attention of one of the [[greatwyrm]]s who
maintains the Vast.
title: Nestling Plateau
tooltip: mountain range in the Vast of Argonnessen, training ground for young dragons
